column5: Product Category

column3:
In the past, matchboxes with Lucky Numbers were highly sought after.11:11 is serendipitous.
A sign of something meant to be. Make a wish before you strike.

Materials
  • Ivory-finished wood
  • Safety matches
  • Striking surface
Specifications
  • Dual magnetic closures on both sides
  • Dimensions: 68mm × 48mm × 22mm
  • Includes two spare striker sheet
Shipping
  • Domestic delivery: 4–5 days after dispatch
  • International delivery: 15–20 days

Note for international orders: We can’t ship flammable materials across borders, so matchsticks won’t be included. You can refill with any regular-size matchsticks found at most local stores.

Care & Safety
  • Store at room temperature (20–25°C) - wood expands and contracts with humidity
  • Refill with any regular-size matchsticks once used up
  • Replace striker sheet when worn - peel and paste to reuse
  • Burn within sight. Keep away from combustibles, children, and pets
